General.Name: Dafeng TV Ltd
General.Description: Dafeng TV Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides digital cable TV services. The company was formerly known as Dah Fung CATV Co. Ltd. and changed its name to Dafeng TV Ltd. in December 2009. Dafeng TV Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 207, Zhonghua Rd, New Taipei City, Taiwan
